options.content:
# IBM Research OpenShift GPU Summary Dashboard

Panels for reviewing GPU metrics:
  * CURRENT  - Live real-time metric data.  Data can be refreshed for updates, but time-selector has no impact.
  * AVERAGES - Key metrics averaged over a pre-defined period of time.  Data can be refreshed, but time-selector has no impact.
  * TRENDS   - Display metrics over a period of time, configurable by changes to the dashboard time-selector.

For details on a specific OpenShift cluster, links have been created to access locally hosted grafana dashboards.

panels.description: The percentage breakdown of GPUs by Cluster
panels.title: Total GPUs by Cluster (Percentage)

panels.description: The total GPU Nodes by individual Cluster
panels.title: Total GPU Nodes by Cluster

panels.description: The total GPU usage by individual Cluster.  This percentage calculation is requested GPUs divided by total capacity in the Cluster
panels.title: Total GPU Usage by Cluster (Percentage)

panels.description: The total GPUs by Cluster in Bar Gauge
panels.title: Total GPUs by Cluster (Count)

panels.description: The total GPUs currently assigned to workloads by Cluster in Bar Gauge
panels.title: Total GPU Usage by Cluster (Count)

panels.description: The total of free GPUs by Cluster
panels.title: Free GPUs by Cluster (Count)

panels.description: 3 Day Average GPU Usage by Cluster
panels.title: 3-Day Avg GPU Usage by Cluster (Count)

panels.description: 3 Day average calculation of The total GPU usage by individual Cluster.  This percentage calculation is requested GPUs divided by total capacity in the Cluster
panels.title: 3 Day Avg GPU Usage by Cluster (Percentage)

panels.title: 7-Day Avg GPU Usage by Cluster (Count)

panels.title: 7 Day Avg GPU Usage by Cluster (Percentage)

panels.description: The total GPUs currently assigned to workloads by Cluster in Trend over time format
panels.title: Total GPU Usage by Cluster (Trend)
